meanings.definition: Apply stucco to (a wall or building)
meanings.sent1: He is stuccoing the old house to give it a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: The workers are stuccoing the exterior walls of the new building.
meanings.sent3: The stuccoing process turned into a fun team project for the family.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was stuccoing the plain walls with colorful patterns.
meanings.sent5: The artist's hands moved swiftly, stuccoing the surface with precision.

meanings.definition: The act or process of applying stucco to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The stuccoing of the house took several days to complete.
meanings.sent2: I watched the stuccoing of the building with fascination.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected rain ruined the stuccoing, creating a messy situation.
meanings.sent4: The stuccoing on the walls resembled fluffy clouds in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The smooth stuccoing on the ceiling gave the room a cozy feel.
